channel.title: Wanting to start my own server however need some help!
channel.description:
Hey guys,
Ive been watching heaps of vids on youtube but i just got a few questions before i start.
What is the best "Game source" to use. Eg - allstar is something. And can you give me the download link to it.
I have downloaded WINRAR, but if i download the SOURCE, do i still need the moperscape client??
Because i want to change admin permissions are stuff, however i know how to do that?
So overall, whats all the stuff i need. And what the best server to use and to change. And download link.
Thanks.

item.title: Wanting to start my own server however need some help!
item.dc:creator: @ibronze ibronze
item.description:
@ibronze wrote:

[quote=“MobilScape, post:4, topic:341470”]So, i have downloaded the DELTA source, Do i have to download the DELTA client or can i use the moperscape client?

Whats better?[/quote]

I would download the Delta client and change everything to ur server name.

Read full topic

item.title: Wanting to start my own server however need some help!
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

Download a Source + Client here
Learning to Code Conventions
Prima’s Melee calculation’s
and finally The Soul’s Starting a Server Guide
PROTIP: THERE ARE NO SILAB ITEMS

&& have a nice day sir.

Read full topic
item.source: Wanting to start my own server however need some help!

item.title: Wanting to start my own server however need some help!
item.dc:creator: @billyjr33 billyjr33
item.description:
@billyjr33 wrote:

ok if i was you i wont use allstar’s base because that is just shit now same with delta but since u r a beginner i would use delta to start off and that so go to the download section and look for a 317 server that you like most likely it would be delta and then download the source and client that come’s with it that should help u out.

Read full topic
